name: Taler - The Taller Dwarf - DEMO
description:
MOVES
WASD QEZC - Move
1234FRT - Hotkeys
LMB - Do Actions
Ctrl. + Move - Turn.
Ctrl. + Drag Item - drag all stack
Shift. + Drag Item - drag one piece of stack

Taler - The Taller Dwarf
Taler - The taller Dwarf is a single player demo game for an Action-RPG game prototype based on MMORPGs and Rogelike Games built in construct 2 engine.

INCOME:
- Rings.
- Mage class.
- Quest Maker.
- Bosses
- Action Mechanics *Mining at first
- A World.
- Expand bag slots
